Usage Details: Denotes a damper in an outside duct used for ventilation purposes, not economizing.
comments: single outside air damper used for ventilation only.

Usage Details: Used to describe a fan with on/off control capabilities.
comments: fan with only on/off control capabilities, constant speed

Usage Details: Used to describe a fan which receives a control signal as a percentage, typically 0% - 100%. This does not guarantee the fan has continuous operating points, i.e. it might only be able to ramp in 5% increments.
comments: fan which receives a control signal as a percentage, typically 0% - 100%.

Usage Details: Used to describe a fan with discrete steps. The numSteps parameter should define the number of discrete operating speeds for the fan motor, excluding off.
comments: fan with discrete steps/speed. The numSteps parameter should define the number of discrete operating speeds for the fan motor, excluding off.

Usage Details: General concept for thing that moves air.  For the sake of simplicity, we couple the fan and motor together.
comments: General concept for thing that moves air.  For the sake of simplicity, we couple the fan and motor together.

Usage Details: Actuator used to control the flow of air, actuator is for controlling the damper position
comments: device/movable plate used to contro/regulatel the rate of flow of air

Usage Details: General equipment
comments: General equipment

Usage Details: Used to describe a damper that is either open or closed
comments: damper with only two position control capabilities, that is either open or closed

Usage Details: Used to describe a damper with 0%-100% control capabilities
comments: damper with 0%-100% control capabilities

Usage Details: An apparatus used to transer energy between two substances.
comments: device/heat exchanger used to transfer heat energy to or from of an air stream

Usage Details: An apparatus used to transfer energy into a substance.
comments: device/heat exchager used to transfer heat/heat energy into an air stream using hot water, steam,refriegrant or electric resistor as a heating medium

Usage Details: An apparatus used to transfer energy out of a substance.
comments: device used to reject heat out of an air stream using cold water or refrigerant as a cooling medium

Usage Details: An apparatus used to transfer energy into a substance using a direct expansion refrigeration cycle.  It is recommended to further refine this with a controlStrategyType (singleStage, multiStage, continuous).
comments: a heating coil using refriegrant as a heating medium

Usage Details: An apparatus used to transfer energy out of a substance using a direct expansion refrigeration cycle.  It is recommended to further refine this with a controlStrategyType (singleStage, multiStage, continuous).
comments: a cooling coil using cold refrigerant as a cooling medium

Usage Details: An apparatus used to transfer energy into a substance using a direct expansion refrigeration cycle with a specific number of stages.
comments: a dx heating coil that uses either a single refrigerant compressor with N speeds or N-number of constant speed refrigerant compressors.

Usage Details: An apparatus used to transfer energy out of a substance using a direct expansion refrigeration cycle with a specific number of stages.
comments: a dx cooling coil that uses either a single refrigerant compressor with N speeds or N-number of constant speed refrigerant compressors.

Usage Details: An apparatus used to transfer energy into a substance using hot water flowing through a coil.  It is recommended to further refine this with a controlStrategyType (singleStage, multiStage, continuous).
comments: a heating coil used to transfer heat energy using hot water as a heating medium(NA)

Usage Details: An apparatus used to transfer energy into a substance using steam flowing through a coil. It is recommended to further refine this with a controlStrategyType (singleStage, multiStage, continuous).
comments: a heating coil used to transfer heat energy using steam as a heating medium(NA)

Usage Details: An apparatus used to transfer energy out of a substance using chilled water flowing through a coil. It is recommended to further refine this with a controlStrategyType (singleStage, multiStage, continuous).
comments: device used to reject heat out of an air stream using chilled water as a cooling medium(NA)

Usage Details: An apparatus used to transfer energy into a substance using electric resistance. It is recommended to further refine this with a controlStrategyType (singleStage, multiStage, continuous).
comments: a heating coil used to transfer heat energy using electric resistor as a heating medium

Usage Details: An apparatus used to transfer energy into a substance using electric resistance with a specific number of stages.
comments: a heating coil used to transfer heat energy using electric resistor with N number of stages as a heating medium

Usage Details: An apparatus used to transfer energy into a substance through the combustion of natural gas.  It is recommended to further refine this with a controlStrategyType (singleStage, multiStage, continuous).
comments: a heating coil used to transfer heat energy using natural gas as a heating medium

Usage Details: An apparatus used to transfer energy into a substance through the combustion of natural gas with a specific number of stages.
comments: a heating coil used to transfer heat energy using natural gas burner with N number of stages as a heating medium

comments: NA

Usage Details: An apparatus used to transfer energy into a substance using electric resistance with theoretical control capabilities of 0 - 100%.
comments: NA

Usage Details: An apparatus used to transfer energy into and out of a substance.  The mode of the equipment determines whether heat should be transferred into (heating) or out of (cooling) the substance
comments: apparatus --> device/Heat Exchanger

comments: NA
